name: My Baby Seals
description:
My Baby Seals are in the mood for a dance party!  Only you can help them get past the stampeding penguins, and watch out for those poachers!  With help from all their Tiny Plastic Men friends, and their Northern Lights fueled by Vitamin X, they've got a real chance.

Unlock all your favorite baby seals!
Upgrade to go faster and farther!
Tons of different clubs to help your seal party!

Coo-coo ka-choo!
